main_characters.name: Joseph
main_characters.description: Widowed NASA pilot who reluctantly becomes a farmer after the agency was closed by the government, and eventually joins the Endurance mission as the lead pilot

main_characters.name: Dr. Amelia Brand
main_characters.description: Professor Brand's daughter and NASA scientist who, aboard the Endurance mission, is responsible for conducting planet colonization

main_characters.name: Murphy
main_characters.description: Joseph's daughter, who eventually becomes a NASA scientist working under Professor Brand

main_characters.name: Professor John Brand
main_characters.description: High-ranking NASA scientist, father of Amelia, former mentor of Cooper, and director of the Lazarus and Endurance missions
